resources.string: Choose a country and learn\n about taboos in that country.
Compete with other players\n to get a high score.
Check your scores or \n create a new user.
Tell your friends about \n this game.

You will visit China for two days with a limited amount of money. There are different levels that will be unlocked as you progress through the story line. Your objective is to pass all the levels with the largest sum of money at the end. If at any time you run out of money, you will have to start again from the first level.
